item.title: Old Snow
item.description: It’s cold today But that’s okay Because even though the leaves and I are falling This autumn weather is still soft and charming As time moves forward it does less and less harming And things move towards harmony I remember the old days Those November/December cold days When we’d walk and shiver in the winter haze Before we ever used a word like bae The nostalgia came and hit me hard

item.title: Repeat
item.description: Don’t drink so much coffee Before you try and sleep You’re mind will race with thoughts Stuck on repeat Stuck on repeat Stuck on repeat And you won’t be scared But you’ll jerk awake Making an audible gasp for air Stuck on repeat On repeat On repeat Thoughts race faster Like a river during downpour Yet they go nowhere Stuck This is is why you Repeat

item.title: Destined
item.description: sunsets seen though never captured a time capsule in a ghost town a snowflake that never meets the snow holding your breath when your house is a vacuum all that was meant but could not make it and not because it couldn’t have tried

item.title: Gold Tinted Glass
item.description: Through the gold tinted glass, the man nodded his head, so I did too

item.title: Beautiful
item.description: I want to make something beautiful I want to be something beautiful But there’s nothing inside me No hint towards creativity No passion No pain No hope to change Just damned up tears All of my magnified fears Can these words really express me? Break apart the walls in my head And relieve me of this anxiety? So terrified of society I’ll just put the walls back up

item.title: The Next Me
item.description: I’m terrified of the next me And what he will do In the ways that he does nothing

item.title: Change
item.description: Two pills Pop them Crawl in Warm bed Empty head Dreams of dread? They’re all dead But I’m not Done growing I keep showing Myself I can change Thoughts rearrange Sometimes derange Derail, a torn sail Cannot bail From this ship I’m the captain And the arsonist Who started this Fantastic mess You thought I would accomplish less? That low bar is a personal best That I keep setting Lower

item.title: Asleep
item.description: “It’s easy to write your thoughts down that way” So said the speaker - a very extroverted creature, a conversational exhibitionist with cosmic quandaries boiled down to aether, we spoke but mostly he talked - I said nothing, I wouldn’t want my spirits eradicated either. To live in the mind is to live blind - my eyes tied at the lid, tied to the skies were my mysteries hid, how easily could they shatter if I left procrastination for another matter.
